body:
go test -v k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubelet/dockertools

```
--- FAIL: TestSeccompLocalhostProfileIsLoaded (0.01s)
        Error Trace:    docker_manager_test.go:1932
	Error:		"[]" does not contain "seccomp={"foo":"bar"}"
	Messages:	The compacted seccomp json profile should be loaded.

        Error Trace:    docker_manager_test.go:1937
	Error:		Received unexpected error "Event \"Normal Created Created container with docker id /k8s_bar2.81; Security:[seccomp=test(md5:21aeae45053385adebd25311f9dd9cb1)]\" not found in [Normal Created Created container with docker id /k8s_POD.623, Normal Started Started container with docker id /k8s_POD.623, Normal Created Created container with docker id /k8s_bar2.81, Normal Started Started container with docker id /k8s_bar2.81]"
	Messages:	testcase 0

        Error Trace:    docker_manager_test.go:1932
	Error:		"[]" does not contain "seccomp={"abc":"def"}"
	Messages:	The compacted seccomp json profile should be loaded.

        Error Trace:    docker_manager_test.go:1937
	Error:		Received unexpected error "Event \"Normal Created Created container with docker id /k8s_bar2.81; Security:[seccomp=sub/subtest(md5:07c9bcb4db631f7ca191d6e0bca49f76)]\" not found in [Normal Created Created container with docker id /k8s_POD.623, Normal Started Started container with docker id /k8s_POD.623, Normal Created Created container with docker id /k8s_bar2.81, Normal Started Started container with docker id /k8s_bar2.81]"
	Messages:	testcase 1

	docker_manager_test.go:595: expected error didn't occur
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference [recovered]
	panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x20 pc=0xcf102]

goroutine 106 [running]:
panic(0xed0080, 0xc4200140c0)
	/usr/local/Cellar/go/1.7.1/libexec/src/runtime/panic.go:500 +0x1a1
testing.tRunner.func1(0xc4202429c0)
	/usr/local/Cellar/go/1.7.1/libexec/src/testing/testing.go:579 +0x25d
panic(0xed0080, 0xc4200140c0)
	/usr/local/Cellar/go/1.7.1/libexec/src/runtime/panic.go:458 +0x243
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubelet/dockertools.TestSeccompLocalhostProfileIsLoaded(0xc4202429c0)
	/Users/feisky/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubelet/dockertools/docker_manager_test.go:1909 +0x652
testing.tRunner(0xc4202429c0, 0x1139278)
	/usr/local/Cellar/go/1.7.1/libexec/src/testing/testing.go:610 +0x81
created by testing.(*T).Run
	/usr/local/Cellar/go/1.7.1/libexec/src/testing/testing.go:646 +0x2ec
exit status 2
FAIL	k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubelet/dockertools	0.371s
```

This is because there are a few test cases in dockertools are linux-specific.
title: TestSeccompLocalhostProfileIsLoaded panic on non-linux platforms
